channel.title: git on Zhao Peng's Blogs
channel.description: Recent content in git on Zhao Peng's Blogs

item.title: Git实用技巧
item.description: 1. 安装Git并为这台机器上所有Git仓库配置 git config --global user.name "Your Name" git config --global user.email "email@example.com" 2. 创建git库 git init 将文件放到git仓库中 git add readme.md git commit -m "write a read me file" git log 查看提交记录 git log --pretty=oneline
